summary: This is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing technical coordination for a case review, specifically locating items in the CAIR system and granting access to individuals. The subject line references 'JE/GM CAIR review', likely referring to Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and Ghislaine Maxwell (GM). The document is part of forensic evidence handling in the investigation.

persons.name: Mdo
persons.context: Mentioned as an individual who needs to be granted access to the case in the CAIR system, and requires an account setup as they do not have OPWAN access.

events.title: Coordination for CAIR case review
events.description: FBI personnel coordinate via email to locate specific items in the CAIR system and grant access to individuals for a case review related to JE/GM.

keyFacts: The email subject is 'JE/GM CAIR review', indicating the case involves Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and Ghislaine Maxwell (GM).
FBI personnel are coordinating forensic review, specifically locating items with identifiers like NYC 024394, NYC 024390, and NYC 024334 in the CAIR system.
Access to the case is being granted to specific individuals, with one named 'Mdo' who needs an account setup.
The document is marked as 'SUBJECT TO PROTECTIVE ORDER' regarding specific paragraphs, indicating restricted handling.
